definition: to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change

sentences.english: I got no problem with people killing themselves.
sentences.chinese: 我不會關心自己找死的人的。

sentences.english: Who wants this in the entire Games things and Chinese rivalry, that is, court death.
sentences.chinese: 誰想在整運動會這件事上和中國人較勁，那就是找死。

sentences.english: Otherwise, as Dylan says, if you're not busy being born, you're busy dying.
sentences.chinese: 否則，就如迪倫所說，不忙於求生，就是在找死。

sentences.english: Put down your arms, or get killed.
sentences.chinese: 要麼放下武器，要麼找死。

sentences.english: Incredibly challenge compare energy with ego, this absolutely be seek dead.
sentences.chinese: 居然敢和自己比較能量，這簡直就是找死。

sentences.english: If you put all your eggs in one basket you're just looking for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把所有雞蛋放在一個籃子裏你只是找死。

sentences.english: You completely in the court death.
I was courting death or at least a kidnapping.
sentences.chinese: 我是在找死，或者等着被綁架。

sentences.english: I get it. You must be ready to die.
sentences.chinese: 我知道了，你一定是想來找死。

sentences.english: One might fancy she was looking for dead things.
sentences.chinese: 有人會想，她在找死了的東西吧。

definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
to have the impertinence/to have the cheek to
to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
to be carried away by one's wishful thinking (idiom)/to labor under a delusion/wishful thinking
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
